title: Password Manager App
description: A secure mobile app for storing encrypted passwords locally using modern Android practices.

title: SpaceX Launch Tracker
description: Browse and filter SpaceX launches in real time, connected to the public API.

title: BattleCats Survivors
description: Mobile game application, BattleCats Survivors immerses you in an arcade shooter roguelite experience, placing you in command of a formidable cat squadron that instinctively strikes down nearby adversaries.

title: Sexy or Ugly Detector
description: Mobile application, Sexy or Ugly Detector is a prank app for you to have fun playing with friends. It simulates reading your finger to detect if you're attractive, but it's just a joke simulation.

title: Gun Idle Clicker
description: Mobile application, Gun Idle Clicker is a casual tap game where you build and upgrade powerful weapons just by tapping the screen. Earn coins, unlock new guns, and level up your arsenal.
